g.text: 1. Press thumb on MX Master 4 ring area
2. On-screen radial overlay appears with 8 action bubbles
3. Hover over an action (haptic tap confirms selection)
4. Release thumb to execute the hovered action
5. Ring profile auto-switches when you change applications
6. Plugin actions auto-populate the ring picker in Logi Options+

svg.text: WISPY CONSOLE // UNIVERSAL AI AGENT CONTROL SURFACE // LOGITECH ACTIONS SDK // HAUSOR LABS 2026
